doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Suspire by Yuumei

main.head: Suspire
main.p: Wenqing Yan, aka Yuumei, is a Chinese born artist living in California. She uses inspirations from nature, her dreams, and personal experiences to create her art. They range from the magical dreamscapes to real world cityscapes, reflecting dynamic emotions from the whimsical to introspective.
